biotools.summary:
When global and local molecular descriptors are more than the sum of its parts.

MD-LOVIs (acronym for Molecular Descriptors from LOcal Vertex Invariants and Related Maps) is a multi-platform software developed in the Java programming.

…methods and tools for Chem-Bio-Med-Informatic Studies.

MD-LOVIs (acronym for Molecular Descriptors from LOcal Vertex Invariants and Related Maps) is a multi-platform software developed in the Java programming language
